__comments.section1: MOST LIKELY TO BE CHANGED BY USER
__comments.UseConfig: true = unattended mode using this file; false = prompt for missing values
__comments.use_console: true = show console window; false = silent mode with HTA status window
__comments.EnvPath: Root folder where Conda environments are stored
__comments.EnvName: Name of the environment folder inside EnvPath
__comments.PythonVersion: Python version to install in the environment
__comments.CudaTarget: GPU build target for PyTorch (e.g., 'cu118', 'cu121'); empty = CPU build
__comments.UseGPU: true = install GPU-enabled PyTorch; false = CPU-only
__comments.DefaultModel: Default Whisper model for GUI (base, small, medium, large-v2, etc.)
__comments.OutputDir: Optional default output directory; empty = prompt or GUI selection
__comments.HuggingFaceToken: Token for Hugging Face model downloads (needed for diarization)
__comments.DiarizeOnFirstRun: true = pre-cache diarization model at setup if token is provided
__comments.UseSystemFfmpeg: true = use system ffmpeg instead of imageio-ffmpeg
__comments.FfmpegPath: Path to system ffmpeg binary (used if UseSystemFfmpeg = true)
__comments.RetryCount: Number of retries for networked installs (pip, conda, Chocolatey)
__comments.LogTimestamps: true = prefix status lines with timestamps in logs/HTA
__comments.ScriptPath: Path to whisperx_gui.py; empty = use launcher folder
__comments.InstallConda: true = install Miniconda if not found; false = require pre-installed Conda
